name: InsideBar Volume Spike Breakout
description: Intraday 15-minute price-action futures strategy that trades E-mini S&P 500 (ES) and E-mini Nasdaq-100 (NQ). A volume spike (≥90th percentile of prior 20 bars) followed by an inside bar sets a compression zone; breakouts of that inside bar within the next two candles trigger trades. Risk per trade is capped at 0.5 % of equity using a volatility-adjusted fixed-fraction position size. Exits use a 1.2×ATR trailing stop or 2.4×ATR take-profit (≈2:1 reward-to-risk), whichever occurs first.
